name: css-filter-sepia
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter sepia

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-sepia.css > css/css-filter-sepia.css && tachyons src/css-filter-sepia.css --minify > css/css-filter-sepia.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-sepia.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
